TextLibrary.Text: Darkhunter joins you as a Companion. You may view your list of Companions in your Hero's Inventory.
The story continues in the full version of Puzzle Quest.
Maethelburg is an imposing city on a hill overlooking the River Maethel. At the very center of the city is an enormous Red Tower - the home of the Riverguard.
You must first travel to Maethelburg.
You must take Moarg to the Riverguard in Maethelburg, or set him free in Skellheim.
You must return to Darkhunter in Gallia.
Darkhunter's business in the Borderlands is finally complete. You may now travel north.
Before he departs, Moarg gives you the sword as promised. You have received Sir Ector's Sword.
